definition: to teach/teaching and learning/education/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]
to teach/to be a teacher/to train/to coach

sentences.english: So in the interest of helping out the next generation of thieves, I'm going to offer you a few pointers.
sentences.chinese: 所以，为了有助于下一代游荡者们，我准备教你几招。

sentences.english: Rachel watches Ben while Ross has a meeting, and she teaches him all about practical jokes.
sentences.chinese: 罗斯开会，瑞秋替他照看儿子班并教他恶作剧。

sentences.english: Mongolian national minority's traditional virtue are many, the father teaches me for the generation toward downloading.
sentences.chinese: 蒙古族的传统美德多呀，阿爸教我代代往下传呀。

sentences.english: But they are willing to teach even though they're not getting paid what they should get paid.
sentences.chinese: 他们还是愿意去教，虽然他们并没得到应得的报酬。

sentences.english: Mentors are not to repair robots or be involved in programming of students' robots.
sentences.chinese: 不允许教練修復机械人或是參与编写程序。

sentences.english: Don't do that. And, also, we're trying to teach you on many levels.
sentences.chinese: 不要那样做，还有，我们要从很多水平教你们。

sentences.english: Don’t ever let an advertising sales rep teach you anything about marketing.
sentences.chinese: 不要让一个广告销售代表教你任何有关营销的事情。

sentences.english: Mary teaches religion. However, she is an atheist. She has an excellent sense of humor.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽教宗教，但她自己却是个无神论者。

sentences.english: I teach history in a university. Have you heard of Dong-Hai University?
sentences.chinese: 我在大学教历史，你知道东海大学吗？

sentences.english: because the accent's very different from what we teach in South America mainly.
sentences.chinese: 因为口音跟我们在南美主要教的口音很不一样。

sentences.english: She also taught me five math problems this evening.
sentences.chinese: 今天晚上，她还教了我五道奥数题。

sentences.english: We're not trying to teach anybody any specific thing.
sentences.chinese: 我们不去尝试教任何人任何具体的事情。

sentences.english: The teacher taught us a freehand drill in the physical education class.
sentences.chinese: 体育课上，老师教了我们一套徒手操。

sentences.english: All over the world, there are classes that teach people how to flirt.
sentences.chinese: 在世界上，到处都有教人们如何调情的课程。

sentences.english: I am not like Confucius who would teach any level regardless. I am sorry.
sentences.chinese: 像是我理应像孔子一样，有教无类，来者就教。

definition: to be a believer (in a religion, esp. Islam)
to teach/teaching and learning/education/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]
to practice/to train/to drill/to perfect (one's skill)/exercise/(literary) white silk/to boil and scour raw silk
